translated: Namo saptāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ oṃ vira viras mahācakra vajri sat saṭa sara ti sara ti trailokyavijayāya saṃpātaya siddhāya ākalpayā svāhā Recite this dhāraṇī twenty-one times, and you will enter all maṇḍala altars. All that is done will be accomplished. Reciting the mantra.
There are body seals and hand seals.
Making the seals and reciting the mantra method is easy to accomplish.
If one has not yet entered the altar,
One should not rashly perform [the seals].
Now, having one recite this mantra,

original: 即當入壇作印行不成盜法也。
analyzed: 即當入壇作印行不成盜法也。
translated: One will enter the altar and perform the seals. It is not stealing the Dharma if one does not accomplish it.

translated: 2. The Mantra of Bodhisattva Sunlight The Mantra of Bodhisattva Sunlight, Part 2 Namo buddhāya, namo dharmāya, maho namaḥ saṃgāya. Dīrghāyuḥ sādhanaṃ sarva-āvaraṇa-vidhvaṃsanaṃ rakṣa rakṣa sarva-duṣṭa-bhūtāṃ. By reciting this mantra, all hindrances are eliminated, and it can ward off demons and remove natural disasters.
Moreover, if one recites it once and pays homage to the Buddha once,
